Items API

账目的增、删、改、查

创建一条账目

POST /api/v1/items

Parameters

Name Description
name 账目名称
tag_id 账目标签id
category 分类，可能的值有：expenses、income
amount 金额
date 日期（秒数）
note 备注

Response Fields

Name Description
data[id] id
data[name] 账目名称
data[note] 账目备注
data[category] 账目类型，可能的值有："expenses"、"income"
data[amount] 账目金额
data[user_id] 账目创建用户id
data[tag_id] 账目标签id
data[created_at] 创建日期
data[updated_at] 更新日期
data[date] 账目日期

Request

Headers

Version: HTTP/1.0
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjozMzEsImV4cCI6MTY2MzMxMjIwMn0.Wn1Rt6IrJRQEYF9fe_M3gqyTvDyCqjVozOPwlk70TIE
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
Host: example.org
Cookie:

Route

POST /api/v1/items

Body

{"name":"测试","tag_id":658,"category":"expenses","amount":5000,"date":1662707402,"note":"这是一个测试账目"}

Response

Headers

X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-XSS-Protection: 0
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Download-Options: noopen
X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none
Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Vary: Accept, Accept-Encoding, Origin
ETag: W/"a329c32f285c8abc26b45fa0dd14aec1"
Cache-Control: max-age=0, private, must-revalidate

X-Runtime: 0.003020
Content-Length: 298

Status

200 OK

{
